prompt: Create a user role management interface with a minimalist black-and-white design. The app bar should display 'User Role Management' in black text on a white background with a settings icon. Include a simple search bar with a thin black border and placeholder text 'Search'. The main content should be a scrollable list of user cards with a clean, borderless design, each featuring a small circular avatar on the left, user name in bold, email in light gray, and role badges ('Admin' in red, 'Editor' in black, 'Viewer' in gray) on the right. Add an 'Edit Role' text button at the bottom of each card. Use a white background with no card shadows for a flat design.
